caption.p: The effects on glioma cell activity and sensitivity to TMZ treatment by LINC00466/miR-137/PPP1R14B axis. ( A) The viability abilities of T98G cells in different treatment groups were measured by CCK8 assay; ( B) Effects of LINC00466/miR-137/PPP1R14B axis on cell resistance to TMZ (200uM); ( C and D) The cell migration and invasion abilities of T98G cells in different treatment groups.
